main event: A streak of fire was observed in the sky, following an aircraft.
interesting points: One observer reported that the fire seemed to be following an aircraft.
Another observer reported only the fire was seen.
A B-111 took off from Patterson Field at 1006 EST on 6 Oct. 66 and shortly thereafter kicked in its afterburner.
The Base Operations at WP AFB received several calls regarding this incident and reported that the unusually large streak of fire was a result of the afterburner being kicked in.
The conclusion was that the object was an F-111 with afterburner.
sighted object: streak of fire in the sky, following an aircraft
